thread.title: Unsettled and mild weather today with showers as warm and cold fronts pass
thread.title_full: Unsettled and mild weather today with showers as warm and cold fronts pass | Examiner.com

author: Joe Kriss
title: Unsettled and mild weather today with showers as warm and cold fronts pass
text:
Thursday 10/22/2015 Capital Region Weather Slideshow The Racing Weatherman View all 6 photos ...WEATHER SYNOPSIS...
The Racing Weatherman, Accuweather Low pressure over southeastern Canada will drag a warm front and cold front pair through the region today. The former will pass through our region this morning, with the later this afternoon and early evening. A brief warm up is expected between the times when the individual frontal passages occur this morning and afternoon, and temperatures may flirt with 70 if the sun comes out long enough. Each frontal passage will also be accompanied by rounds of showers. Some of the showers with the cold frontal passage may be briefly heavier with some gusty winds.
Cooler, drier, and more seasonable air will be over the region for Friday and Saturday with mostly sunny skies expected each day as high pressure takes over. Clouds increase Saturday night ahead of another series of frontal systems that look to make Sunday a bit on the unsettled side.
Fair weather returns again to start the new work week next week with a seasonable temperature profile in place. Unsettled weather returns by midweek next week with another parade of weather systems looking to impact the region.
...Below is the official forecast for the Capital Region and vicinity...
Today : Mostly cloudy with a chance of showers early this morning. Intervals of clouds and sunshine and mild with a chance of showers once again this afternoon. High in the upper 60’s. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 MPH this morning, shifting west late this afternoon and increasing to 10 to 20 MPH. Rain showers this afternoon may contain briefly gusty winds as well. Chance of rain is 50 percent.
Tonight : Partly cloudy. Low near 40. Northwest winds 5 to 10 MPH.
Friday : Mostly sunny and cooler. High in the mid 50’s. Northwest winds 5 to 15 MPH.
Friday Night : Mostly clear, calm, and cool. Low near 30.
Saturday : Mostly sunny. High in the upper 50’s. South winds 5 to 10 MPH.
Sunday : Mostly cloudy with a 40 percent chance of showers. High near 60 and low near 40.
Monday : Mostly sunny. High near 55 and low near 35.
Tuesday : Mostly sunny. High near 55 and low near 40.
Wednesday : Mostly cloudy with a 40 percent chance of showers. High near 60 and low near 45.
